example.source: <a:caldropdown output-format = "yyyy-mm-dd" caption-format = "yyyy/mm/dd" width = "200" initial-message = "Please choose a date"> </a:caldropdown>

<a:vbox width="200" margin="0" height="43"> <a:caldropdown id = "cdd1" edge = "5" output-format = "ddd, d mmmm yyyy" caption-format = "yyyy/mm/dd" initial-message = "Please choose a date"></a:caldropdown> <a:textbox value = "{cdd1.value || 'The value of the calendar is displayed here'}"> </a:textbox> </a:vbox>

<a:caldropdown id="lol" output-format = "yyyy/m/d" caption-format = "yyyy/m/d" value = "{sp3.value}/{sp2.value}/{sp1.value}" width = "200" initial-message = "Please choose a date"> </a:caldropdown> <a:hbox height="24" margin="5 0 0 0"> <a:spinner id="sp1" width="40" edge="5" min="1" max="28" value="3"></a:spinner> <a:spinner id="sp2" width="40" edge="5" min="1" max="12" value="3"></a:spinner> <a:spinner id="sp3" width="60" edge="5" min="1997" max="2012" value="2009"></a:spinner> </a:hbox>
